DataElement.preferredName: Person Rib/Iliac Crest Waist Circumference Length Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value of waist circumference measured at the midpoint, to the nearest 0.1cm, of the iliac crest (top of hip) and the bottom of the rib cage (10th rib).  [Manually curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Waist circumference measured at the midpoint, to the nearest 0.1cm, of the iliac crest (top of hip) and the bottom of the rib cage (10th rib).  [Manually curated]

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:No value exists.:A projection or projecting structure, or ridge, especially one surmounting a bone or its border.:The abdominal circumference at the navel.:The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it.

Concepts.definition: Any one of the paired bones, 12 on either side, extending from the thoracic vertebrae toward the median line on the ventral aspect of the trunk. The long curved bones which form the rib cage. Generally, ribs 1 to 7 are connected to the sternum by their costal cartilages and are called true ribs, whereas ribs 8 to 12 are termed false ribs.
The broad, dorsal, upper, and widest of the three principal bones composing either half of the pelvis.
A projection or projecting structure, or ridge, especially one surmounting a bone or its border.
The abdominal circumference at the navel.
The length of the closed curve of a circle; the size of something as given by the distance around it.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed for the the linear extent in space from one end to the other.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Length; the linear extent in space from one end to the other.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
